C

Camera_feedback - Class in carl.abr.IO
Used to open camera, and capture each frame using cam_PreviewCallback.
Camera_feedback(int) - Constructor for class carl.abr.IO.Camera_feedback
Constructor that will open the camera, set parameters and link a preview callback that will copy the latest frame.
Camera_feedback.cam_PreviewCallback - Class in carl.abr.IO
Implements PreviewCallback interface with Camera_feedback.cam_PreviewCallback.onPreviewFrame(byte[], Camera) which is called every time a new frame is available.
Camera_feedback.cam_PreviewCallback() - Constructor for class carl.abr.IO.Camera_feedback.cam_PreviewCallback
 
CAMERA_STARTED - Variable in class carl.abr.threads.Main_thread
true: camera feedback has been been created and started.
